body_html:
OK, thanks, I've posted the question here:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42473745/remove-all-traces-of-tensorflow-gpu-installation-on-win10

I think there is some trace of the GPU installation left after uninstalling, which might be viewed as a bug. Any pointers to unregistering these ops would be greatly appreciated!

body:
OK, thanks, I've posted the question here:

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/42473745/remove-all-traces-of-tensorflow-gpu-installation-on-win10

I think there is some trace of the GPU installation left after uninstalling, which might be viewed as a bug. Any pointers to unregistering these ops would be greatly appreciated!
